title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in DeWitt, IA | Holst Family Chiropractic
description: Mind Body Connection in DeWitt, IA. Holst Family Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in DeWitt serving all of your needs. Call us today at (563) 659-9935 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
